## PdfEngineMethodRequestBody type

Request body that represent method calls of PdfEngine, it contains the method name and arguments

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PdfEngineMethodRequestBody = {
  [P in PdfEngineMethodName]: {
    name: P;
    args: PdfEngineMethodArgs<P>;
  };
}[PdfEngineMethodName];
```

**References:** [PdfEngineMethodName](./engines.pdfenginemethodname.md)<!-- -->, [PdfEngineMethodArgs](./engines.pdfenginemethodargs.md)
